title: 2019's Best Games Took Dedication To Love
description: 2019's games didn't always make themselves easy to love, but that didn't mean they weren't worth it for those persistent enough to unearth the brilliance in these originally mystifying games.

title: DOOM II Gets a 60 FPS Update and Downloadable Add-Ons
description: Bethesda has released a brand new update for DOOM & DOOM II. It includes free downloadable Add-ons (featuring John Romero's SIGIL), 60 FPS, aspect ratio options, level select, and even more. Today, Richie and Persia are checking out the Quality Of Life changes for DOOM II.

title: Pokemon Sword And Shield - Expansion Pass Announcement Trailer
description: The Isle of Armor and The Crown Tundra are two brand new expansions coming to Pokemon Sword and Pokemon Shield.

title: We Played The Alienware UFO, A Switch-Like PC Gaming Device
description: Alienware made a big splash at CES 2020 with the Concept UFO prototype, a PC that you can take on the go like a Nintendo Switch. Michael Higham and Mat Paget got hands-on with it and give their impressions.

title: Henry Cavill's Face Modded Into The Witcher 3
description: We're playing The Witcher 3 with Henry Cavill's face modded onto Geralt, in honor of the Netflix series! The mod used is the "Game Lore Henry Cavill Retexture" made by Shadowphonic on NexusMods, which can be found here: https://www.nexusmods.com/witcher3/mods/4163
